rwalkr 0.5.2

API using Socrata to Melbourne pedestrian sensor locations

pull_sensor.Rd

Provides API using Socrata to Melbourne pedestrian sensor locations.

pull_sensor(app_token = NULL)

Arguments

app_token

Characters giving the application token. A limited number of requests can be made without an app token (NULL), but they are subject to much lower throttling limits than request that do include one. Sign up for an app token here.

Details

It provides API using Socrata.

See also

melb_walk_fast

Examples

# \dontrun{
pull_sensor()
#> # A tibble: 65 x 9
#>    sensor sensor_id longitude latitude direction_1 direction_2
#>    <chr>  <chr>         <dbl>    <dbl> <chr>       <chr>      
#>  1 Build… 59             145.    -37.8 North       South

#>  3 China… 20             145.    -37.8 East        West

#>  5 Bourk… 57             145.    -37.8 West        East       
#>  6 Lonsd… 40             145.    -37.8 South       North      
#>  7 Lygon… 31             145.    -37.8 South       North      
#>  8 China… 19             145.    -37.8 East        West       
#>  9 Lygon… 37             145.    -37.8 North       South      
#> 10 Queen… 36             145.    -37.8 South       North
